effect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.
effect.fr: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.
effect.es: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.
effect.pt: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.
effect.de: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.

effect.en: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.
effect.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est maintenant Brûlé.
effect.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival pasa a estar Quemado.
effect.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario viene bruciato.
effect.pt: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Queimado.
effect.de: Das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt verbrannt.
